statelist.text: An entity is drifting through nothingness.
There doesn't seem to be any purpose for a dimentionless entity to have a name.
As untethered from reality and any frame of reference as this entity is, maybe even it deserves an identifier.
Type a name for this entity
Your name is _NAME_ and you suddenly have an identity. You have been nothing for forever, and now you are something. Around you, things are beginning to materialize.
You fight, as if against a current, for a tether to the material plane. It appears you have a choice.
You begin to notice a feeling.
In comparison to nothingness, this feels bizarre. It is the feeling of taking up space. Welcome to the 3rd dimention.
You realize that you may have already been experiencing the 4th dimention. Perhaps your path is not as simple as you thought.
choices: Explore the dimention in which you exist

statelist.text: Parsing the world is fairly intuitive. You understand things by the distance they are from the seat of your conciousness. You have control over parts of the world.
What would you like to control?
Your fingers move. The air is cold. You're lying on a cold metal surface. The surface is ridged.
Theres not much space to wiggle your toes. It seems youre wearing boots.
It feels good to fill your lungs to their maximum capacity. You notice the air is almost salty, as if you're next to the ocean.
From behind your eyelids, you can see a faint neon glow. You open your eyes and look around. You're lying on a bench near a bus stop.
